title: Vaccine Usefulness and the Business of Bitcoin Mining
itunes:title: Vaccine Usefulness and the Business of Bitcoin Mining
description:
Dr. Ian Lustbader, Clinical Professor of Medicine at NYU Langone discusses the usefulness of vaccines. Greg Greifeld, Deputy Chief Investment Officer at Runway Growth Capital talks about venture debt. Sam Tabar, Chief Strategy Officer at Bit Digital, discusses the business of bitcoin mining. And we Drive to the Close with Sylvia Jablonski, CIO at Defiance ETFs.

Hosts: Tim Stenovec and Carol Massar Producer: Paul Brennan

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
